snippet: MALLARD--Henry. The NY Psychoanalytic Society & Institute mourns the loss of our esteemed member Henry Clay Mallard, M.D. His intellect, clinical acumen, clear-sightedness, quiet humor, devotion, and extraordinary character will be sorely missed. He gave selflessly to others as a teacher, supervisor, analyst, colleague, as a TA at NYPSI, a psychiatric consultant to the Episcopal Diocese of New York and Medical Director at SPOP. He is survived by his loving wife, Laura Osinoff Mallard. Donations in his honor can be made to New York Psychoanalytic Society & Institute, nypsi.org, or to Calvary Hospice, calvaryhospital.org. We extend our deepest condolences to his family. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, May 15, 11:30am at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W 76th St. 1/3
